text: @ChanelRion @pnjaban @DailyCaller @WhiteHouse @whca My daughter is one of our soldiers in Iraq who was supposed to be coming back home this summer but whose tour has been extended due to COVID-19 even though nobody on her base has tested positive for it.  Would you please ask when our troops will be allowed to come home?
